p: All statistical analyses were performed using SAS (Cary, Carolina do Norte, EUA) [ 31], version 9.1. Data for milk fatty acid profiles and milk fat oxidative stability were analyzed in a completely randomized design in a 2 Ã— 2 factorial using PROC MIXED, SAS (Cary, NC, USA). Milk fat oxidative stability was analyzed with a repeated measures analysis. Oil, antioxidants, and the interaction between oil and antioxidants were considered fixed effects, and the cow was designated as a random effect.
